name: Comelito demo
description:
The comelitos have invaded the earth and only you can save the planet! Use power gems to destroy comelitos for a limited time and take all the gems in the levels to win and face king comelito, this is the demo version

the full version is here:  https://sivlesoft.itch.io/comelito-full

for watch the sivlesoft news click here: http://sivlesoft.blogspot.com/
